question: where is clara perrin based?
answer: With Master 2 (M2) from IAE Nancy School of Management, Licence Administration Economie et social from IAE Nancy School of Management, Erasmus from Faculty of Management, Comenius University in Bratislava, Clara Perrin has 6 mos of experience as a Chargée de développement RH at GROUPE MAUFFREY in Saint-Nabord, Grand Est, France, 1 yr 7 mos of experience as a Chargée de recrutement at GROUPE MAUFFREY in Saint-Nabord, Grand Est, France, 2 yrs 1 mo of experience as a Assistante ressources humaines en alternance at GROUPE LIVIO in Saint-Étienne-lès-Remiremont, Lorraine, France, 4 mos of experience as a Étudiant stagiaire at Manpower France in Epinal, 1 yr of experience as a Employée polyvalente at Colruyt Group in Saint-Léonard, Lorraine, France and is proficient in.
